Subject: Loving Your Cosplay Body
Description: Just because you are not an exact replica of the character you'd like to be doesn't mean you can't pull off a great cosplay of them. Size, sex, race, or physical abilities should not hold you back from being who you really want to be. We will discuss how to accept, cover, camouflage, and overcome your body issues and cosplay with confidence.   Speakers include:Wendy Carson, John Belden - Track: Costuming  - Duration: 50 minutes

Subject: Cosplay 101
Description: Dressing up really seems like fun. You've seen other people doing it and now you think you might want to try it yourself. I can provide you with some advice, tips, and tricks in order to get you on the right track.   Speakers include:Wendy Carson, John Belden - Track: Costuming  - Duration: 50 minutes

Subject: Cosplay Hacks Part 1
Description: Do you have a great costume idea but can't find a pattern or the ability to make it? I have some great advice and techniques that will help you get through it all. We will be addressing alteration of existing items or patterns, pattern creation, sewing alternatives, and some clever tricks to help you on your way. Part 1 of 2.  Speakers include:Wendy Carson, John Belden - Track: Costuming  - Duration: 50 minutes

Subject: Party Planning
Description: Whether it's a formal dinner or gaming night, how to prepare for, run, and still enjoy your get-together.  Speakers include:Wendy Carson, Mitchell Bowling, Hannah Davis - Track: Life  - Duration: 50 minutes

Subject: Geek Cred: How to Be a Better Geek
Description: Fandom should bring people together, not be used as a cudgel.  How can the geek community become more inclusive?  Speakers include:Wendy Carson - Track: Life  - Duration: 50 minutes

Subject: Gender and Geek Culture
Description:
How do we eliminate the 'women aren't real [fill in the blank] sterotype?  Are we doing everything we can to bring more people into the geek fold?  May also include discussion on transgender and gender-fluid fans.
  Speakers include:Wendy Carson, Hannah Davis, John Belden - Track: Life  - Duration: 50 minutes

Subject: The Family That Games Together
Description: How does your family game? Do you use games to communicate and relax as a family?  Are games a fun challenge or educational tools, or both?    Speakers include:Ann Lemay, Wendy Carson, John Belden, Jeremy Leonard - Track: Gaming  - Duration: 50 minutes

Subject: Cosplay Hacks Part 2
Description: Do you have a great costume idea but can't find a pattern or the ability to make it? I have some great advice and techniques that will help you get through it all. We will spend more time addressing specific questions and needs of the audience in a hands-on way. Part 2 of 2, attendance of Part 1 is not required.  Speakers include:Wendy Carson, John Belden - Track: Costuming  - Duration: 50 minutes
